title: Rob Bragin
text:
Rob Bragin is an American television <a href="television%20producer">producer</a> and <a href="screenwriter">writer</a>. He is the creator of the American <a href="supernatural%20fiction">supernatural</a> <a href="drama%20%28film%20and%20television%29">drama</a> "<a href="Proof%20%282015%20TV%20series%29">Proof</a>", which starred <a href="Jennifer%20Beals">Jennifer Beals</a>, <a href="Matthew%20Modine">Matthew Modine</a> and <a href="Joe%20Morton">Joe Morton</a>. He also produced for the television series "<a href="Murphy%20Brown">Murphy Brown</a>" from 1993 to 1997.
Bragin has also worked as a writer/producer for television programs, including, "<a href="Committed%20%28American%20TV%20series%29">Committed</a>", "<a href="Growing%20Pains">Growing Pains</a>", "<a href="Miami%20Vice">Miami Vice</a>", "<a href="Army%20Wives">Army Wives</a>", "<a href="Greek%20%28TV%20series%29">Greek</a>", "<a href="Lipstick%20Jungle%20%28TV%20series%29">Lipstick Jungle</a>" and "<a href="Just%20Legal">Just Legal</a>".
